caption.p: Selected fragments derive from the molecular weight of the polyphenol minus one (due to ESI- ionization) and their subsequent fragmentation in MS/MS experiment. Notes: Vanillic acid in black, Chlorogenic acid in violet, Catechin/Epicathechin in dark blue, Oleuropein in dark green, Epicathechin gallate in brown, Rutin in light green, Gallocathechin/Epigallocathechin in light blue.
